description:
Angela Blanc appears first as maid to Lord Henry Barymore of Houndsworth, who treats her poorly in public. Finnian initially becomes infatuated with her beauty and gentle kindness, until he learns of her true dominatrix personality.
She has ties with the organization that killed Ciel`s parents, even suggested it might have been her who killed them. Later it is revealed that she is an angel. Like other members of the organization, she has an obsession of purifying souls that are filthy with negative emotions, referring to them as Unclean.
name: Angela Blanc
